==Oblivion Ceremonies==
Unless otherwise marked all ceremonies cost one rouse check, five minutes per level to cast and winning an Resolve + Oblivion Difficulty (Ceremony Level + 1). Ceremonies that benefit the recipient can only be cast onto the user themselves unless otherwise stated. They also usually require additional components in order to cast.<ref>[[Vampire: The Masquerade Cults of the Blood Gods]], page 208</ref>
